crazyballrun.game.gui

Class GUIEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • crazyballrun.game.gui.GUIEngine

  • public class GUIEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    The GUIEngine interacts strongly with the GraphicsEngine for rendering of graphical user interface and additionally handles the IControl-GUI- interaction. It also loads the GUI-configuration file which specifies where to place which GUI-Control and actions caused by activision.
